nl.inl.blacklab.search

Class Kwic

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.search.Kwic

  • public class Kwic
extends java.lang.Object
    A "keyword in context" for a hit (left context, hit text, right context). The context lists in this class store all the properties for each word, in this order: - punctuation before this word ("punct") - all other properties except punctuation and word (e.g. "lemma", "pos") - the word itself ("word") So if you had "lemma" and "pos" as extra properties in addition to "punct" and "word", and you had 10 words of context, the List size would be 40. (The reason for the specific ordering is ease of converting it to XML, with the extra properties being attributes and the word itself being the element content of the word tags) The Hits class matches this to the Hit. This object may be converted to the old-style Concordance object (with XML strings) by calling Kwic.toConcordance().

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> left
      Word properties for context left of match (properties.size() values per word; e.g. punct 1, lemma 1, pos 1, word 1, punct 2, lemma 2, pos 2, word 2, etc.)
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> match
      Word properties for matched text (properties.size() values per word).
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> properties
      What properties are stored in what order for this Kwic (e.g. word, lemma, pos)
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> right
      Word properties for context right of match (properties.size() values per word).
